Sentencas: Biogas can be used as a fuel for electricity conversion.
Titulo: Adsorption of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on silica gel for biogas purification

Sentencas: However, volatile organic silicon compounds (including siloxanes) in biogas severely damage combustion engines or solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Adsorption of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on silica gel for biogas purification

Sentencas: Three adsorbents of different nature were tested for octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane (D4) removal and silica gel (SG) proved to be the most efficient.
Titulo: Adsorption of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on silica gel for biogas purification

Sentencas: It was shown that SG adsorption capacity is in the order of 250 mg(D4)/gSG and the adsorbent bed height has little influence on this adsorption capacity.
Titulo: Adsorption of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on silica gel for biogas purification

Sentencas: In the presence of water (relative humidity of 70%), the adsorption capacity was lowered by 90% due to competitive effects and preferential adsorption of water.
Titulo: Adsorption of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on silica gel for biogas purification

Sentencas: An increase of the temperature of roughly 20 degrees C also lowered the adsorption capacity but the decrease was less than 15%.
Titulo: Adsorption of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on silica gel for biogas purification

Sentencas: Moreover, SG regeneration by heating was only partial, probably due to siloxane polymerization on SG.
Titulo: Adsorption of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on silica gel for biogas purification
